The '''Blackcliff Forge''' is a [[Point of Interest]] located southwest of [[Liyue Harbor]], [[Liyue]].

It is known for its being the birthplace of the [[Blackcliff Series]] and [[Prototype Series]] weapons. [[White Tassel]]s are also produced here.

==NPCs==
* [[Manager Kuan]] &mdash; Shift Supervisor
* [[Jingda]] &mdash; Worker
* [[Iron Shoulder]] &mdash; Worker
* [[Gummer]] &mdash; Millelith

==Trivia==
* The motto of the Blackcliff Forge is "Let our actions be recognized by hard work. Let our achievements be what speaks first."<ref>{{Ref/NPC|Manager Kuan}}</ref>
